sentences.en: All the alien innards in the film were actually sheep brains, raspberry jam and chicken entrails.
sentences.cn: 照片中所有的外星人内脏，其实是羊脑，木莓酱和鸡肠。

sentences.en: Extracts from fugu entrails had the biological function of agglutinating cells.
sentences.cn: 从河豚鱼内脏分离得到的一种具有凝集红细胞生物功能的活性物质.

sentences.en: F é lix: I love her from my very entrails.
sentences.cn: 费力克斯: 我发自五脏六腑地爱她.

sentences.en: Fresh, without skin, head, paws bone and entrails, well frozen.
sentences.cn: 新鲜, 去皮 、 头 、 爪及内脏, 冷冻适宜.

sentences.en: He cut out the steaming entrails.
sentences.cn: 他割下冒着热气的内脏。

sentences.en: I'll pull your entrails out and jump rope with them!
sentences.cn: 信不信我把你肠子扯出来当绳跳?

sentences.en: Objective To explore the relation between meridians cohering on the organism and channel and point - entrails effect.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨经脉线的附着组织与经穴 — 脏腑效应之间的关系.

sentences.en: The dish is make from the entrails of a sheep.
The entrails, however, and the legs he shall wash with water.
sentences.cn: 但脏腑与腿要用水洗,祭司就要全然奉献,烧在坛上.

sentences.en: The javelin penetrated the serpent's scales and pierced through to his entrails.
sentences.cn: 长矛穿过鳞片刺入了蛇口的内脏.

sentences.en: The more the worms writhe , the more I crush out their entrails!
sentences.cn: 我就越恨不得挤出它们的内脏!

sentences.en: The more the worms writhe, the more I yearn to crush out their entrails!
sentences.cn: 虫子越受苦, 我就越想碾碎它们.

sentences.en: Their blood will be poured out like dust and their entrails like filth.
sentences.cn: 他们的血,必倒出如灰尘,他们的肉,必抛弃如粪土.

sentences.en: There was another spasm in his entrails, the heavy boots were approaching.
sentences.cn: 他的五脏六腑又是一阵痉挛; 皮靴咔嚓声又走近了.

sentences.en: Winston's entrails seemed to grow cold.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿只觉得心里发凉.

sentences.en: Winston's entrails seemed to have turned into ice.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿的五脏六腑似乎都变成了冰块.

trans.tran_en: the inside parts of an animal’s or person’s body, especially their intestines
